title: Akinator the Genie v3.1 [APK]
description:
With MyWorld, Akinator knows you better than even!
Akinator can read your mind and tell you what character you are thinking about, just by asking a few questions. Think of a real or fictional character and Akinator will try to guess who it is. Will you dare challenge the Genie?
************** NEW: TRY OUT THE MyWorld EXPERIENCE! **************
The talents of Akinator never end! Another surprise from the Genie: with MyWorld, discover a new way of playing. Challenge Akinator even more: make him guess who are your relatives and friends and gather them all into your own galerie MyWorld.
Even better! Akinator can guess your friends and relatives even if you are not playing. Impossible?! Pass your mobile to your friends and try out the MyWorld experienceÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and be ready for the amaze!
***********************************************************************************
Features ++
-Available in several languages (French, English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Chinese, Turkish, Korean, Hebrew, and Dutch).
-Additional background (Akinator in Japan).
-Sharing of your results on Facebook and Twitter.
-Child filter to let your children play safely.
-Version also adapted for your tablet.
Become Akinator's fan on Facebook:
Follow Akinator on Twitter:
Please note:
-Akinator, Genie App, requires an Internet connection to use his magic lamp. Turn on Wifi or be sure to have a data plan (like 3G).
-To select your language, don't forget to scroll down the list to find it.
-Available in Arabic (only from Android OS 4.0).

What's New
NEW: TRY OUT THE MyWorld EXPERIENCE!
